title: AFL WAG Rebecca Judd shows off cleavage in black lingerie
text:
She credits cardio tennis as the secret behind her slim figure.

And AFL WAG Rebecca Judd showed off her cleavage and washboard stomach, in a mirror selfie shared to Instagram Stories on Tuesday.

The 36-year-old sported a black Victoria's Secret push-up bra and matching leather skirt in the picture taken in a changing room.

'How good are their push-up bras?!' AFL WAG Rebecca Judd (pictured) showed off her cleavage and washboard stomach in Victoria's Secret lingerie on Tuesday

Rebecca took the photo with her left hand, drawing attention to her diamond wedding rings, and her beauty look included curly locks and glamorous makeup.

The Postcards presenter tagged Victoria's Secret in the post, and remarked: 'How good are their push-up bras?!'

Speaking to body+soul in July this year, Rebecca said she only exercises for two hours each week.

Impressed: Rebecca tagged Victoria's Secret in the post, and remarked: 'How good are their push-up bras?!'

'I am addicted to cardio tennis, I play for two hours, twice a week because it's really fun. It's a total game changer.'

'There's no serving,' she continued. 'It's a cardio workout where the music blares, the coach just feeds you balls, you do awesome drills with lots of running and it's 60 minutes that goes so quickly.'

The mother-of-four previously shared her day on a plate with Mamamia, which includes dessert every night.

Trim: The Postcards presenter credits cardio tennis as the secret behind her trim figure, and consumes a diet of muesli, sushi, lean meat, brown rice and salad

Rebecca has muesli and a strong latte for breakfast, followed by sushi or a focaccia for lunch, and crackers with cheese or popcorn as snacks.

Dinner is some form of lean meat with brown rice and a salad, and dessert is either chocolate, ice cream or cake.

Rebecca lives in Melbourne's Brighton with husband Chris Judd and their children, Oscar, eight, daughter Billie, five, and twin sons, Tom and Darcy, three.
description: She credits cardio tennis as the secret behind her slim figure.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
